name: Cube Fighter (Adriaj)
description:
Cube Fighter is a top-down game in what you need to fight different enemies and survive.




This game has only one map with 3 stages, the color of the stage represents the difficulty of it.



Controlls:
ESC - pause game
W, A, S ,D - MOVEMENT
RIGHT CLICK - SLOW MOTION
LEFT CLICK - SHOT
SPACE - DASH

Show your fastest time beating all enemies(Approximately 57 enemies) on our discord: https://discord.gg/sjrrMrrzsA

Credits:
Game Development: AdriajSounds: L0lvers
